Room.Name: Polearms Retailer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a shop that specializes in polearms
Room.LongDescription: The polearms shop is very useful for those who cannot find polearms anyplace else. The Hafnia Polearms Retailer sells polearms to just about every retailer in the world and probably has the best prices. If you know what you want, but can't find it anywhere, come here.
